headline.main: Our City Rulers.; ALMOST AN ASSASSINATION IN THE PARK THE OUTRAGE OF TWO OF OUR CITY OFFICIALS.

docs.lead_paragraph: In the TIMES of Tuesday morning we published a report of the improper and insulting treatment of two ladies by two of our City officials, and of the threats of the brother of one of them, a well-known political character, to revenge the outrage. The affair came near a bloody consummation yesterday afternoon.

docs.snippet: Perhaps it is well to palliate the fears that exist trough the country in regard to the cattle disease, that exists as an importation from Holland, and only as such, in Massachusetts. The disease of a similar nature is this vicinity, bred by...
docs.lead_paragraph: Perhaps it is well to palliate the fears that exist trough the country in regard to the cattle disease, that exists as an importation from Holland, and only as such, in Massachusetts. docs.snippet: This forenoon a detachment of United States Dragoons will leave New-York for Carlisle, Penn., where they are to be immediately qualified for active service in the Western departments of the Army Lieut. WHEELER will take temporary charge of the...
docs.lead_paragraph: This forenoon a detachment of United States Dragoons will leave New-York for Carlisle, Penn., where they are to be immediately qualified for active service in the Western departments of the Army Lieut. WHEELER will take temporary charge of the command.

headline.main: The New Arctic Expedition.; DEPARTURE OF DP. HAYES.
PITCAIRN'S ISLAND.; Letter from a Missionary Condition of Affairs on the Island.

docs.snippet: The sympathetic interest with which every intelligent American is following the strange and splendid career of GARIBALDI in Sicily, and which will be cordially manifested to-night, we trust, at the Academy of Music, is not likely to be diminished by...
docs.lead_paragraph: The sympathetic interest with which every intelligent American is following the strange and splendid career of GARIBALDI in Sicily, and which will be cordially manifested to-night, we trust, at the Academy of Music, is not likely to be diminished by the news which reaches us this morning from Naples.
